Class DetailsViewController

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.masterController.DetailsViewControllerMaster
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.manager.DetailsViewController
public class DetailsViewController extends DetailsViewControllerMaster
Controller class for managing the details view in the manager role. Handles the display and interaction with shuttles and their associated data.

    • onKommentarButtonClicked

      public void onKommentarButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action of the comment button click. Opens the comment view for the selected shuttle.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the comment view.

    • onFreigebenButtonClicked

      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
